categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: The Blue Wave was a Mon Calamari cargo hauler that served in the Alliance Fleet early in the Galactic Civil War.

The Blue Wave transported medical supplies and other non-combatant equipment that were meant to be delivered to Rebel cells throughout the Pakuuni sector. The cargo hauler was eventually sabotaged by storm commandos and exploded on its approach to Daltarra. The storm commandos traced the incoming shipment to specific locations and individuals in Quenin, which led to the discovery of a Rebel listening outpost on the planet. The Rebel listening outpost was subsequently eliminated by Darth Vader.
